entry: Support for webcam and microphone in Replay and Record
original_text: Support for webcam and microphone in Replay and Record

entry: Added support for sending arbitrary changesets and partial changsets with ksdiff.
original_text: Added support for sending arbitrary changesets and partial changsets with ksdiff.

entry: - Updated Settings page including link to "My Rewards"
original_text: - Updated Settings page including link to "My Rewards"

entry: - Score Attack Mode: a new way to play through the story! You start at level one with all Spirits and Idols unlocked. Combat performance is rated for efficiency, and all areas are repeatable.
original_text: - Score Attack Mode: a new way to play through the story! You start at level one with all Spirits and Idols unlocked. Combat performance is rated for efficiency, and all areas are repeatable.

entry: _ Reduced battery usage
original_text: _ Reduced battery usage

entry: Fixed a bug where the summary text in document titles and tabs might not properly update.
original_text: Fixed a bug where the summary text in document titles and tabs might not properly update.

entry: _ Fix for an issue where older conversations were not appearing for some people
original_text: _ Fix for an issue where older conversations were not appearing for some people

entry: - Many visual and performance improvements
original_text: - Many visual and performance improvements

entry: Fixed issue that could prevent Kaleidoscope from picking up changes made to a document open in more than one window.
original_text: Fixed issue that could prevent Kaleidoscope from picking up changes made to a document open in more than one window.

entry: •	New: Now you can filter and sort your playlists and tracks.
original_text: •	New: Now you can filter and sort your playlists and tracks.

entry: Sofa has acquired all Versions intellectual property from Pico. You can read the entire press release here.
original_text: Sofa has acquired all Versions intellectual property from Pico. You can read the entire press release here.

entry: - Fixes OS X 10.5 crashes on startup
original_text: - Fixes OS X 10.5 crashes on startup

entry: - The size buttons now show what size they will be saving.
original_text: - The size buttons now show what size they will be saving.

entry: Video: Send videos from your phone's camera roll and when people send you videos, play them right in the app.
original_text: Video: Send videos from your phone's camera roll and when people send you videos, play them right in the app.

entry: Search
original_text: Search

entry: •	Fixed issue where manual sort ordering was lost on relaunch.
original_text: •	Fixed issue where manual sort ordering was lost on relaunch.

entry: The option to recursively revert is now only shown when reverting a folder
original_text: The option to recursively revert is now only shown when reverting a folder

original_text: _ Performance and bug fixes

entry: Calls are now more reliable.
original_text: Calls are now more reliable.

entry: •	Better handling of invalid sites.
original_text: •	Better handling of invalid sites.

entry: Swipe to the left to reveal all your wishlists
original_text: Swipe to the left to reveal all your wishlists

entry: - The cropping tool has been enhanced. The free transform option has more control, and we've added a golden ratio crop option.
original_text: - The cropping tool has been enhanced. The free transform option has more control, and we've added a golden ratio crop option.

entry: Improved security on the passcode entry screen.
original_text: Improved security on the passcode entry screen.

entry: - The t-shirt button has been removed, and the store shut down. Thanks to every one who got a shirt, we were able to raise $6,000 for charity!
original_text: - The t-shirt button has been removed, and the store shut down. Thanks to every one who got a shirt, we were able to raise $6,000 for charity!

original_text: Clicking the file shelf button in a background tab now selects the tab

entry: •	Fixed issue that caused the app to not come out of minimized state by clicking on the dock icon.
original_text: •	Fixed issue that caused the app to not come out of minimized state by clicking on the dock icon.

entry: Fixed a bug where Kaleidoscope would not open a changeset after the license agreement was accepted
original_text: Fixed a bug where Kaleidoscope would not open a changeset after the license agreement was accepted

entry: We plan to continue updating the game in the coming days at this cadence. Thank you for playing.

entry: - Microphone and game sound mute indicators will only be shown when they are muted
original_text: - Microphone and game sound mute indicators will only be shown when they are muted

entry: File names containing numbers are now correctly sorted in the file browser
original_text: File names containing numbers are now correctly sorted in the file browser

entry: - Fixed an issue in the Bullhead Trial where the text stated that the Gold Prize requirement involved completing the trial having taken less than two hits instead of three.
original_text: - Fixed an issue in the Bullhead Trial where the text stated that the Gold Prize requirement involved completing the trial having taken less than two hits instead of three.

entry: New: Say hello to Spotify Connect. Listen to music on your Connect-enabled speakers, and use your mobile to control the music.
original_text: New: Say hello to Spotify Connect. Listen to music on your Connect-enabled speakers, and use your mobile to control the music.

entry: This update includes a major upgrade, from CEF1 to CEF3.
original_text: This update includes a major upgrade, from CEF1 to CEF3.
